name: Shape Rave
description:
SEIZURE WARNING! DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU'RE AFRAID YOU CAN GO BLIND!!!

Navigate your way around by using [Left] and [Right] keys.

Goal of the game is to collect as many shapes as posible. You can do this only if you "are" the same shape. You can change your shape by using [Up] and [Down] buttons. Avoid collecting "wrong" shapes.

There are 4 bonuses to make your gameplay even more fun.
Good Luck - You'll need it.
